channel.title: 317 Connection Problem
channel.description: I'm using 317 Ultimate-PVP source and only I can connect. The server in the client is correct. The server in the source is correct. Port 42594 is the port for the source. It's open. I'm thinking the client port is messed up. How do I change the port on the client?

item.title: 317 Connection Problem
item.dc:creator: @grey_apple2 grey apple2
item.description:
@grey_apple2 wrote:

I’m using 317 Ultimate-PVP source and only I can connect. The server in the client is correct. The server in the source is correct. Port 42594 is the port for the source. It’s open. I’m thinking the client port is messed up. How do I change the port on the client?
